questions.question: Which of the following best describes a non-sinusoidal oscillator?

answers.a: An oscillator that produces only sine waves
answers.b: An oscillator that produces exponentially decaying signals
answers.c: An oscillator that generates square, triangular, or sawtooth waveforms
answers.d: An oscillator that uses transformers to amplify sine waves

Answer :.d: An oscillator that generates square, triangular, or sawtooth waveform

questions.question: What is the primary application of non-sinusoidal oscillators?

answers.c: Timing and waveform generation in digital circuits

Answer :.c: Timing and waveform generation in digital circuits
